DOC.brief_summary: This study will examine the efficacy and safety of ReFacto AF in patients with severe and moderately severe hemophilia A undergoing elective major surgery when administered by either bolus injections (BI) or continuous infusion (CI).
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating B-Domain Deleted Recombinant Factor VIII (BDDrFVIII, ReFacto AF) in Patients With Hemophilia A Undergoing Elective Major Surgery
DOC.criteria: Male, at least 12 years old, with severe hemophilia A undergoing major elective major surgery requiring FVIII replacement for at least 6 days. Negative FVIII inhibitor test at screening and no past history of inhibitor. Previously treated with at least 150 exposure days to any Factor VIII product Normal hepatic and renal function tests and no other bleeding disorder
